eu.bavenir.vicinity.gatewayapi.restapi.services

Class AdaptersAdid

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.resource.Resource
      • org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
        • eu.bavenir.vicinity.gatewayapi.restapi.services.AdaptersAdid

  • public class AdaptersAdid
extends org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
    This class implements a ServerResource interface for following Gateway API calls: URL: [server]:[port]/api/adapters/{adid} METHODS: GET, POST SPECIFICATION: @see Gateway API ATTRIBUTES: adid - VICINITY Identifier of the adapter (e.g. 1dae4326-44ae-4b98-bb75-15aa82516cc3).
    Author:
    sulfo
